product_name: 180s Exolite Sonic Ear Warmers with Headphones - 2013 Overstock
long_description: Designed for music lovers, the 180s Exolite(TM) Sonic Ear Warmers with Headphones let you listen your tunes while protecting your ears from the chilly nip of winter. Compatible with most handheld devices, including smartphones and MP3 players; headphones include microphone for hands-free conversation. QuantumSound(TM) speakers provide excellent sound to enjoy a pleasant listening experience. Soft, breathable QuantumHeat(TM) fabric wick moisture and retains body heat to keep you comfortable. 180s Exolite(TM) Sonic Ear Warmers with Headphones fit comfortably around the back of the head and over your ears; click-to-fit frame adjusts to fit various head sizes. Collapsible design provides convenient pocket-sized storage. Ear warmers can be worn alone or with hats, helmets or glasses. Overstock.
short_description: Designed for music lovers, the 180s Exolite(TM) Sonic Ear Warmers with Headphones let you listen your tunes while protecting your ears from the chilly nip of winter.
